Html:
Hello,

I'm using Flee for the first time to do some calculation, and I have a big number of variables, the issu is when some expression is wrong, I have the KeyNotFoundException of the Dictionary, but, it will be very helpful if I get what key was not found, because the end user of my application (built in C#) will be able to edit those expressions, and it will be nice to have some explicite error message.

So, how can I do that ? Thanks in advance.
